Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901260
In-book reference  : Book 19, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 19, Hadith 001
1901260.text: Anas ibn Malik said: “Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) would often wear the head veil, as if his robe was the robe of an oil dealer.”
